inclusion.criterion: Aged ≥ 56 to ≤ 89 days on the day of the first study visit
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Born at full term of pregnancy (≥ 37 weeks) and with a birth weight ≥ 2.5 kg (or 5 lb 8 oz)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent form has been signed and dated by the parent(s) or other legally acceptable representative (and by an independent witness if required by local regulations)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subject and parent/legally acceptable representative are able to attend all scheduled visits and to comply with all trial procedures
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Participation at the time of study enrollment (or in the 4 weeks preceding the first trial vaccination) or planned participation during the present trial period in another clinical trial investigating a vaccine, drug, medical device, or medical procedure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of any vaccine in the 4 weeks preceding the first trial vaccination (at Visit or planned receipt of any vaccine in the 4 weeks before and/or following any trial vaccination except for influenza vaccination, which may be received at a gap of at least 2 weeks before or 2 weeks after any study vaccines. This exception includes monovalent pandemic influenza vaccines and multivalent influenza vaccines)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous vaccination against meningococcal disease with either the trial vaccine or another vaccine (i.e., mono- or polyvalent, polysaccharide, or conjugate meningococcal vaccine containing serogroups A, C, W, or Y; or meningococcal B serogroup-containing vaccine)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous vaccination (before Visit 1) with any pneumococcal, diphtheria, tetanus, pertussis, hepatitis B, Haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib), poliovirus, and/or rotavirus vaccines. Receipt of Bacille Calmette Guerin (BCG) vaccine at birth is acceptable.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of immune globulins, blood or blood-derived since birth
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of previous vaccination against meningococcal disease with the trial vaccine. They have also received pneumococcal and Hib vaccines in the past.
